resources.string: Impossible to perform test. Failure with data connection.
Warning about data billing, you\'re on mobile network type.
Unknown network type. Try to update the app or report this as a bug.
Download file too small. You might not be connected to the real web, or try again later, or try to update the app.
The timing result is considered to be good. Your connection seems pretty fine.
The timing result is considered to be halfway. Your connection seems ok but not so fast.
The timing result is considered to be bad. Your connection seems pretty slow.

A small dedicated file was downloaded from Network Tester website, and its content was correct. So everything\'s fine with your data connection, you\'re connected to the real web, there\'s no filtering or redirecting.
A small dedicated file was downloaded from Network Tester website, and its content was incorrect. You\'re probably not connected to the real web, but redirected somewhere else like a billing portal!
